title: marksalnikov
author: marksalnikov
content: DONUT WALLETREFERRAL CAMPAIGNInvite friends and earn 500 DNT for each referralTo participate in the referral program, copy your referral link and place it wherever you wantBOUNTY CAMPAIGNBOUNTY REWARD POOL = 50 BNBARTICLE CAMPAIGN - 10 BNBYOUTUBE CAMPAIGN - 15 BNBTELEGRAM CAMPAIGN - 5¬† BNBREFERRAL CAMPAIGN - 10 BNBTWITTER CAMPAGN - 10 BNBGENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONSIf you want to take part in this bounty you have to join in the following telegram groups:Telegram Community - https://t.me/donut_walletTelegram Channel - ¬†https://t.me/donutwalletnewsBefore filling out the form you have to make a proof of authentication post in this threadPROOF OF AUTHENTICATIONCode:Code:Bitcointalk Profile Link:Telegram Username:Bounty Campaign`s:TWITTER CAMPAIGNRULES‚óè ¬†Must have at least 50 followers‚óè ¬†Follow and like the official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/donutwallet‚óè ¬†Make 1 tweet and 1 re-tweet every day. Use information from official social networks. Your tweet should have hashtags: #BSC #DeFi #Crypto #Airdrop #PresaleREWARDS‚óè 50 - 500 Followers: 1 stake, per one tweet or re-tweet‚óè 501 - 1000 Followers: 2 stakes, per one tweet or re-tweet‚óè 1001 - 3000 Followers: 3 stakes, per one tweet or re-tweet‚óè 3001 - 5000 Followers: 4 stakes per one tweet or re-tweet‚óè 5001+ Followers: 5 stakes per one tweet or re-tweetYOUTUBE CAMPAIGNRULES‚óè Video must be 2 minutes long‚óè Videos must include link to the official website in the description‚óè Video mustbe published on a crypto related YouTube channel with minimum 150 subscribers‚óè Plagiarism or use of other's material will be considered as an invalid submission‚óè No more than five videos from one person‚óè Use these hashtags in your videos/articles: #BSC #DeFi #crypto #blockchainREWARDS‚óè Excellent: 4 stakes (High quality video and >4000 subscribers)‚óè High: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 subscribers)‚óè Good: 2 stake (Average quality video and >1000 subscribers)‚óè Average: 1 stake (Average quality video and >150 subscribers)ARTICLE CAMPAIGNRULES‚óè Article must have at least 500 words‚óè Post your article on Medium,Steem,Publish0x and other popular blogs‚óè Only quality articles will be accepted and rewarded‚óè Use these hashtags in your videos/articles: #BSC #DeFi #crypto #blockchainREWARDS‚óè Original article: 5-10 stakesTELEGRAM CAMPAIGNRULES‚óè Join To - https://t.me/donut_wallet‚óè Join To - https://t.me/donutwalletnewsREWARDS‚óè 1 stake‚óè 10 stakes for setting name
